Blog.post: Juz read through my blog which was posted last wk...den realised tt i haven update new blog for 1 wk le...... haiz... no tym to write..... rite nw is 6:03AM... juz nw 5 sumthin woke up by my dad... den realise i had slp frm 28/7 (ytd) to juz nw w/o bathin worz ^^".... heez.... MY MUM LAHZzz.... everytym dn wan to wake mi up frm my nap.... lucki no hmwk or test arx... n nw,eatin maggie mee ^^!!...haven pack bag lehz...29/7 (todae) still gt nuthin to write coz still earli in e mornin mahz.... so gonna start writin things abt last wk....... ->23/7 Fri~Enjoy myself *Tonite*...~ ErmZzz.... actualli nuthin special lahz....bt todae is fri... so muz HAPPI! HAPPI! loz (earli dismiss lehz)..... Other than tis...todae im goin to Justin's chalet...Man qi dai de worz... tonite cn stay dere...prob is c i wan or dn wan lahz... bt if feli gt stay den i'll stay wif her (she was tryin so hard to persuade her mum...) coz i cnt stay dere wif Justin onli mahz + his relative...later dey all narrow minded den will hai dao Justin...lst,todae amth lesson 1 period onli...nt nice bt nt v sian oso..do some sums bt i think no hmwk given la... lucki lohz.. den geog lesson .. *free period*... coz mdm Lee cum lyk no cum lidat... tok n laugh n play until her lesson end...todae we gt s.s test aft recess haiZzz....bt ytd mani of us sae tml ask Devan to postpone.. so i study lyk nv study loz...in e end.... cnt postpone~...-_-.. bt later bcum lyk nt a test...coz he noe we took out our txtbk bt he close 1 eye open 1 eye... feli share txtbk wif mi n it is so ming sian loz.... summore we discuss!! he oso hack careZzz..... bt he sae mon gonna giv REAL test again..so todae 1 nt counted....bt we still copy la (coz he still wan to collect...v de bo liaoZzz-_-)... den he oso v WEIRD... go behind chat wif e boiz n dey all stop doin e test lorz... dey chat n chat..den ph pro arh... took out her mid yr exam pper to copy ans...(coz e qns for tis test is e same qns as e exam).... den she copy until v relaxin...N den... Yappixx!!.... finalli sch end le....bt v sad...coz aft tt justin realise tt his hp lost... HP LOST!!!!GONEX!!!! He go everywhere find...@ last go library find...still dn hav bt gt back his hse key n duno wat..bt no hp...den e stupid idiot library auntie take e things tt e malay boi pass to her bt she saw gt hp she nv ask frm dem!! V TootX lehz...wah piangz... den still dare to ask Justin go n take frm dem...of coz in e end cnt gt bac lahx...later Justin ask us go hm lst den i gt bac hm n do my own stuffz....den meet feli go Justin's hse...Gao yuan was oso dere...bt he nv go chalet wif us.. he goin to cut hair later worz... den aft awhile 3 of us walk to Justin his aunt's hse n help to carry food... at lst i quite pai seh lahz...den later his auntie ask mi n feli which 1 is Justin gf huh?...of coz nt lahz -_-"... reach e chalet le den we go eat...den walk bac to chalet...n in e middle of e nite...e rd we walk gt dogs kep on barkin... so scary!!!!... duno y Aloha dere gt so mani wild dogs....bt until 4:00am+ we still usin tt rd (coz we wan to go Cheers)...over dere..., we chat e whole nite....tok mani things abt our parentz... for mi is given too much freedom le...dey dn care much abt mi nw le lorz,bt if dey start scoldin mi dey oso wun care so much 1...juz scold n scold n i will tok bac until i win~ (mostly is i win my mom,hardly win my dad ...he too pro le...x_X) bt feli is parent everytym disallow her tis n tt....+ duno y their parent kep on callin their hp to noe where dey r...my parent realli din...haiz...sad for Justin too... his mum kep on treatin him lyk little boi...v naggy.... he reali cnt tahan liao so quite pityful lahz...den gt bac chalet tt tym is already 6+ le... slpy n giddy liao... so we quickli SLPZzzzz.... ->24/7 Sat~haiz...Quite a borin dae actuali.....:( Wahzzz....todae mornin Justin's Auntie wake us up...ask us go into e rm n slp...so we giddy giddy walk into e rm (coz slp for 2hr+ onli..) n tt stupid Justin make fun of us durin our slp....he called feli up n sae ''Felicia!..qi lai xiao bian....'' boliao lehz....lucki feli scold him onli...He pull my pillow when i was slpin, damn annoyin bt bo bianz...he is playful even though he is slpy... slp until 11 sumthin Hui Fang called n asked mi whether i will go for dance later...haiz,dn wan oso cnt mahz...so later mi n feli decided to rinse up n go hm...Den later i gt hm n do my stuffz...until gonna go for dance le den i tell my mum tt i wun b cumin bac tonight n she sae take care of urself horz .... Todae actuali go Hui Fang's hse eat lei cha 1... bt haiz.....cher end lesson so late den in e end i nv go le... Later took train wif wen yi to go Pasir Ris...on e way we tok n laugh loz...later reach dere liao den i took bus to chalet.....@ lst duno which stop to gt down bt i agar agar den v lucki haha (gt down @ e rite stop)... Den i wait for Justin dey all v long @ outside Escape bt dey had reach dere 15min ago le.... duno y dey stand behind e pillar n in e end cnt c each other... later dey sae wan go for bowlin bt muz wait damn long for our turn so we decide to go arcade ... bt aft awhile i felt so sianz...(if feli gt cum jiu hao)... Sh n Gy oso lyk sianz sianz 1.. later decide to go bac to chalet coz dey sae i haven eat den faster go bac chalet eat bbq...bt actualli i dn wan to go bac...coz Justin's mum is dere...later she definiteli narrow minded 1 (even Justin oso sae tt)....coz im e onli gal goin tonite... den reach dere le...greeted every1...den saw mani ppl..all r Justin de uncle's frenz... all gt tattoo 1...v scary bt dey v humorous...(nt as bad as wat i thought)... later Justin's mum go hm tt tym came n approach mi n sae y dn dare to greet mi? scare of mi ar?....OF COZ NT LAHZ... i greeted her le lehz...bt lucki nuthin lahz... she went hm tt tym Justin so happi.... bt later is rather nt fun to mi le...dey make e bbq for mi n saw gy doin funni things... he is usin tongs to play wif smoke?!...stupid act rite? bt funni lahz.... later eat finish le den e guyz play cards wif e uncle...dey lame while playin lohz..i sat there n Justin kep askin mi to plae bt i dun wan...i look @ dem enuff le..few hrs later...4 of us went out n tt stupid idiot dog bark again... bt Justin still manage to lure e dog awae...den Justin dey all went to buy firecracker n dey make e stupid rocket....fail all attempts... make mi doze off.... den went bac to chalet...3am+ nia...slack awhile n watch tv..aft tt Justin go bath den my turn to bath den when i cum out....every1 slp le... v bad lehz...tt idiot sh slp on sofa...gy slp until v funni den Justin gt 2 pillow n slp on e floor lohz....haiz den tinkin where am i goin to slp??.... awhile later...gy woke up den i tok to him awhile ...den he go tease Justin...suddenli he woke up...den he v gan jiong lidat...giv mi pillow n jacket...gd fren indeed nehz... later im goin to slp le bt saw tt gy is lookin for a gd spot to slp... bt diff lahz...den i doze off le....... ->25/7 sun~Miss my stay @ chalet + tml mon le..->GO TO SCH-_-... Aft e lousy slp of last nite....finalli wake up le...bt i tink bcoz of gy n sh tok too loud,... dey woke mi up... bt nvm...i continue to slp for sum tyms...den reali wake up le... den i turn n look at justin... WAOZzz...he hide himself under e curtain n kep on turnin here n dere... he is cold im sure...den later i tried to wake him up... bt i took a long tym to c him gt up... @ e same tym... gy waitin for sh to leave e sofa..coz he wan to slp... wonderin izzit juz nw he sat dere wait until nw !?..... later Justin's aunt wake up le...busy in e kitchen..i quickli wake up n go brush teeth...9 am+ every1 wake up le...den eat curry n soup cooked by his aunt...tt was delicious!!!! @ tt tym feli reach le...she cum n look for us...After i ate finish..mi,feli n justin went to e pool bt feli nv gt down .. (b4 tt gy n sh went off lohz..) she nv prepare any clothes to swim so onli mi n justin gt down...Swim inside awhile we gt v impatient liao...co z we waitin for e ppl inside e zaguzzi to gt up... n finali our turn liao... it was so relaxin~... later we chat inside e zaguzzi n play bubble fight... haha... v fun siax... den feli kep walkin to e side of e zaguzzi..v pity lehz...if she gt prepare clothes to swim jiu hao...dun ned to stand dere n look @ us...after tt we realli shuang until dn wan to gt out of e zaguzzi bt CNT...gt DANCE later...so reali hav to gt up le.......... after bathin..,watch tv awhile den we head to huay guan... reali bu she de..bt still hav to go... Haiz...within e 2 daez....gt to noe more abt each other's stuffz.. find tt justin had change alot frm last tym n mani...so reali thanx tt he invite us to e chalet!!....Den later we reach huay guan le... bt was late by 1hr... lucki Pei Ling jie nv scold... den after e sweaty dance... we went hm...bt we took e train wif ps onli diff is tt she head to Clark Quey as she gt work in e evenin...den reach sk le den went to board bus 372...inside e train already doze off le... den inside 372 oso de same haha....reach hm liao i tink eat dinner lohz... den face com until v late den nuah ard... pack bag n gt into my bed...nite Zzzz .... ->26/7 Mon~Lazy dae,...quite nervous for todae's rehersal..... Todae emth lesson lucki nv call mi go to e board again arhx (coz nv do finish)... den sit @ my place n copi sums tt i nv do de...mrs wang is still so gd bt todae 1 period nia... if amth lesson was nt 2 period bt emth was 2 period jiu hao lohz.... later gt geog lesson den v fast end coz mdm lee mahz...wahahaha.... after tt gt amth... SIANZzz... hate his lesson + hate amth eventuali so much n todae ppl gt PMS worz... gt angry n start scoldin ppl...den lesson end liao bt we still doin amth n suddenli gt 1 tcher came in n sae y we haven change...aft tt i den noe yuan lai ta shi wo men de relief tcher lahz...blonde hair sia...quite cute lookin too... e PE lesson was so fun... he teach us hw to play rounderzz n we gt it v fast... tis type of PE lesson den enjoyable mahz.... we plae n plae until we dn bear to end e lesson... Den aft recess liao gt s.s bt hear story frm Devan lohz...later Hist lesson gt suan by hairy ang... ask mi y nv bring notes n i sae last wk gt bring wat...dis wk nv bring lohz,cn share wif feli mahz...den she sae u tink mthly gal's things huh... den i tink awhile ______ ->NO LINK lohz... Bo liao... act cute.... den nag n nag until she shuang liao den continue her stupid lesson... last lesson is EL...oso sianz...aft sch liao mi n sam go bac my hse n take my leotard n stuffz den go foodcourt find ps n frenz.... eat tt tym oso tok n laugh until v happi...^_^ Later go bac sch liao Jus n gy oso go bac n dey sit in e hall watch our rehersal...den finish rehersal liao continue dance lesson n aft sweatin lyk mad le it is ard 6:30pm liao... den go hm... do usual stuffz lohz.... nth to sae le hahazz.... -END- ->27/7 Tues~ Errrrzz....lst period is e worst period of all within todae... tt is CHEMISTRY....suck manx tis lesson....alwae make mi so slpy...e onli lesson make mi wan to slp....had to look @ her for 2 hrs....reali cn die...n nw sae wan teach lecture style....bt lyk shit lohz.... [will b bac to finish tis]

Eh~.. nw v silent in my rm nehz... gd ,fin alli gt peace bac...juz nw feli came my hse coz i brought trouble to her ... hee ps hor feli~.. she had to cum my hse to gt her s.s notebk coz i brought it hm n copy notes (i 4gt to bring to sch duno hw mani wks liao worz wahaha~).... she sae either she cum or i bring it to her...of coz i ask her to cum la..haha..no ned to b urgent 1..bt bcoz of e test tml... SianZzz~... On e 20th of July....~ I am so tired durin tis wk..coz nv slp earli lorz so eventualli dn hav de mood to write + mind is blank + slpy so nv cum n update...lst lesson of e dae i gt a warnin by idiotic miss wee -__-... fall aslp den she told feli, "IF SHE WAN TO SLP,GT OUT.."~ feli quicky knock my elbow den i suddenli Xia dao den wake up lohz...later i ask feli wat happen den she told mi...big deal mehz...n Leon oso gt warn...she sae ,"call tt thing up!".... wat kind of atitude she shown huh...she tink she fierce i scared huh...everytym she step into classrm i will gt so tired automaticali..act lyk an expert durin lesson worz,sae tt she is teachin usin lecturer style... KNS!!!~hate her to e core manx... i tink im gtin angrier liao...kaez,aft tt we gt Phy lesson..my son (cher look so much lyk la bi xiao xin lehz n im MEI YA...his ah bu..) came in to teach..we tok cock wif cher n he oso stupid 1...lame loz..we tink nt funny den he tink v funny n will laugh..den we ________silent~... we laugh den he wan to scold us...haiz~siao liao lahz...Durin geog lesson,Feli was called to stay bac for geog remedial.. wahaha...i cn go hm lehz...so sad for her ^__-..... Todae go hm watch e vcd tt ps brought to sch for mi...bt ahem...e cantonese one is "YELLOW JOKES" cartoon...wah liao..watch awhile den i change to la bi xiao xin disc...nicer + 'healthier'...n @ last,i still nv spare much tym to study amath...haiz..fail bahz..todae v happie...mum gt a drawer for mi n i cn put my bks n wksht into it + my precious high heel shoe~... pack 1/2 wae feli called to tell mi wat to brin tml n den disturb mi awhile..tt is y pack until so late den no tym do hmwk oso...so, end of e dae.... On e 21st of July....~ Haiz~tirin tirin~...todae rainin sia... whole shoe gt wet ...told cheryl wun b late bt she still sae will late...make mi walk lyk dunno wat lidat den sumthin gt drop off @ e shoe soe .. bt bo bian.. die die oso muz walk to sch... den leg gt soak for so long..real sad n gao we sia...~ e lst lesson mt lyk start awhile niax den bell ring liao....go bac to class... CHEMISTRY~... muz c tt idiot ugly long hair kns woman again...lucki 1 period niax..Nowadays find tt mrs wang gttin more as an easy goin tcher liao... lidat betta mah.. betta dan dos hairy woman... tink i luv her lesson nw...@ least nt slp cum lst liao..bt 1 period onli.. den 2 period amath!... oh,n i gt an egg for my amth test..i knew it...nvm... den mrs edison nv cum... 2 period lesson lehz..do abit hmwk + chat wif ppl den i gt into my dreamland again...haiz~ recess tym tt feli was so detestable...do things tt i hate to c... she noes... make me so ps... bt lucky ph help mi...didn hav a gd recess tym too...straight aft gt bac to class..we were inform tt eddie will tio cane later..oh,y make things difficult for himself? haiz..hope he noe wat is gd for him...saw e cannin tactics..terrifiyin sia..wahz...gt to c a relaxin performance too..coz of e racial harmony dae... n 2dae nv bring tie n name tag n badge...lucki nv catch arhx... den ask sin wee help mi gt tie.. she so gd~ e performance gt 1 xiao char bo v funi.. make us laugh all e way...quite nice...hiak hiak...dance lesson tt tym...lin lao shi nv cum..b4 tt,few of us went to kfc eat satay burger... ok lahz...still is spicy to me heex...tt idiot kok sae wana join us for lunch bt cum le den go off...xiao lang...later aft e break n ji ben gong, we start our practice of e chair dance.. dance all e way + correctin each others... realli havin great tym...all e way till 6:10pm...haha... Went hm immediately slp~...chou chou oso slp...bo bian...body nt operatin liao... slp until 10+ den wake up..aft bath den slack ard i go to bed again... end of e dae liao... Todae 22/7~ i m already half dead nw..... Yoyoyo~ 2 dae mt lesson v xiang shou... watch xiao qian until dn wan to go for nxt lesson...bt lucki finish 1st disc le...came down for emth den wang go through some qns frm tys... tt was nice too... we do wksht mainly to help us wif e mock test aft sch...Den PE liao Edison 2dae nv cum~ gt a free period again...e r - cher so funni...walk in lyk a student ( i realli thought he is!) + wear e clothes everything look similar to our sch U.. den tok lyk sisi lidat...wana go up n take my file bt he sae 1 pass onli allow 1 person so muz wait v long sia... bo liao lehz... he wanna act clever... den recess tym go up n gt my file...2dae my plate nv hold properli den my 'lu dan' nearly drop off e plate....i quickli sae sorri! sorri! to e gal bside mi coz she sia dao... hee hee....den Phy lesson lo... xiao xin todae ask ph n ps to stand up as dey were kep lookin @ each other's palm n laughin while havin lesson... bt real funny la..Todae oso ned to do eng tys bt i nv bring hm..die liao lohz..feli oso...den amath liao...gt bac my pper n oso an egg again... tis tym samuel,sin wee n mi gt zero bt nt fair lo... he wrote tt i nt payin attention in class..lyk real... samuel was playin bt he nv write...den discussin whether wan to drop amth ant,as we realli cnt kai qiao ... se riously tinkin liao...gonna ask mr lee abt it..2dae eng lesson i wake up,slp,wake up,slp... so tired~den do summary...lucki i quite fast finish doin..Aft sch le..waitin for mock exam..den go canteen eat lst..eat awhile den go bac classrm..Bt...~ so suay...invigilator is miss wee...sian ar... tok sooo much instruction n rul es lyk we realli duno lidat... boliao... start even late leh... den went hm no food to eat... :( stir 1 cup of honey den go bac my wonderland n on my com immediately ...of coz,i listen to w-inds. lst la...^^...later gt to bed n nitez~ wahaha...slp half way feli called den i rmb she cumin over later.. go n bath n eat den surf net wif her..den msn awhile...wahz..12am + liao...walk wif her to e rd n sae buaiz~ den i went hm..eat my supper den until nw...gotta stop le.. haven revise s.s!!!!!!!!! die le lahz!!!!!!realli hav to stop le....nitez bloggie!!!! muackZZZZzzzzz!!!^.^

Heiyo Z z z ... wat a fine dae sia...todae wake up late,gotta wake up @ 5:45AM actuali...bt in e end wake up @ 7:10AM - -".... GD LO ,lidat cnt do hmwk liao~ rush to sch lohz.... (almost late) hee..Todae cher go through hmwk i so scared~.. .Every1 had to take turn go up to e board n write down e ans ...bt lucki in e end gt e ans frm feli when we both went up to e board to do ... woooo~ (no sweat ! ).. after tt slpy lohz...todae cher no cum so NO PE!... but A mth lesson i fall aslp n bein wake up by mr lee..den recess tym liao,sae nt to eat too much wif sam bt still eat chicken rice n buy drink...How m i goin to pay finish e $ i borrow frm jas? help mi !~ .. ... WAHAHAHA !!~ ...after sch tt tym i so energetic + excited.. coz cn c tt cher again liao... he gt e look which i lyk... decent + cute(esp his smile !! ) + guai guai etc... so long to c him...bt i nv gt to c him while i was standin outside general office...means he came late todae..bt nvm la..i went to eat lst,wif sam n feli n ps + sum boiz... den acc justin wait for bus,tok tok awhile den go bac sch... coz gt cca todae... BT... still no chance to c...later dance 1/2 wae xie sae wana go to hall to dance...bigger space mahz...den every1 go down..on e wae dere i still saw ppl havin oral..mean xie's fault lahz...urge us to go down...After tt.. ps n sam ask mi quicki put on spect coz tt cher still inside e hall invigilatin.. . SO hAPPI... c him 1 last tym liao (coz todae last dae cumin our sch for oral).. later realli gt smile to mi again !!!!! tt idiot ps still wave hand n sae bb... purposeli 1...ppl lyk wat she oso lyk...damm it lahz...nvm i noe he frm which sch liao...todae not much thing to do lahz onli gt go loo for v long lahz...lucki reach hm le den stomach pain... i cnt think much le... onli noe tml gt A mth quizZz...nv studi oso...haiz..i think im goin to bed in awhile coz buay tahan liao... Gtg nw... Miss mi Miss mi !!!!!! ... * nity * bloggie ... ~

Haiz ~ nv update for 4 daez le...reali busy sia.. last week catch 1 movie n 2 concert!!!! The concert by * * huay guan on thurs were damm lousy sia ... wah liao waste my tym,lucki is FREE ticket ... sat one not bad ... still gt some dance which i realli lyk ... on 15/7 thurs it was quite an 'excitin' dae n oso abit funni ... tis is sort of a secret ... hee ... watch a dance concert n den after tt walk ard at clark quay ... den went hm wif sam,ps n feli ... 16/7 fri i went to catch a movie wif jas ... tt was realli a nice show to mi .. we even took neo print .. haha v funni durin e tym we were takin neo print ... after tt take bus hm bt wrong direction .. gt down at commonwealth n den take taxi hm ... haiz .. waste $$ ... overall tired bt happi la..17/7 sat as usual .. i went to dance class but lin lao shi giv us a few mins tok ... include sayin tt i tui bu le!!!!!! die la ... tis is oso nt wat i want ... bt i realli dunno y...gotta jia you le ... after tt go c concert den went to lao pa sat eat .. yummi!!! my stomach gonna burst bt i still felt v shuang ... hee ... gt hm at 1am + ... damm tired so nv go online oso ... 18/7 as usual go for dance ... but todae jas dance half way stomach ache ... went to toilet bt nv cum bac ... after tt den i noe she went to c doctor le...scare she gt food poisonin .... ya, n zhi hui oso ... dunno izit dey both drink milk tea until lidat or wat ... after tt go eat wif sam .. nv catch movie wif ps n feli coz wanna save $$ ... eat wif sam was realli nice ... e food alwaez taste nicer dan eatin individualli ... n bein knock down by an AUNTIE ... n i fall down on e stair ... lucki my hand support mi ... or else i will box tt woman .. nv turn n sae sorri ... walk until lyk kana sai lidat ... yuckz!! Gonna finish my food n start do hmwk le .. hope tml go through eng mock exam pper coz i nv do finish eng hmwk hee ... haiz gt dance tml sia ... sad lehz ... nvm la ... WK HARD!!! gotta go off nw ... night night bloggie ~ 19/7 1:37AM >gonez ...

Wah Liaoz~...its 4AM nw...gt bac to 13/7 lst..i quite enjoy myself todae... coz ps bought ' C O L O R ' so i cn c liao...i oso wan to buy lehz..bt v $$ .... :( bt nvm la...i die die oso muz buy.. still, for e sake of Guo Pin Chao n W-inds.^_^!!!! Haizzz...tml oral liao la...i v v v v scare lehz..i scare i tok half way will da jie...i definitely cnt calm down myself de... i 100% v jing zhang + v v jing zhang + v v v jing zhang one!!!!!!!!!! Todae onli ps n mi went to hou.mall.....bt gd la...we always crazy on e same few idol..so wan ki siao oso cn tok until ki siao tgt mahz...haha.. todae went to foodcourt to eat... make ps share wif mi e hotplate blackpepper beef...so oiishi!!!!!
